column4: hi. i am trying to open .swf files with MC directing to vlc player,,, i edited the Video line in /etc/mc/mc.ext with :: regex/\.([sS] [wW] [fF] )$    /    Include=video,,, but the file(s) will not open up in vlc, does anybody have an idea what i am missing ?
where did you read to edit that file.
if i recallc orrectly, vlc should play an FLV file w/o editing, at least it did for me
have you tried any other video players?
